law.catch_line: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, a qualified organization may conduct a raffle....

text.section: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, a qualified organization may conduct a raffle.

section.section:
The proceeds of a raffle:
shall benefit the qualified organization; and
shall be used for the purposes of the qualified organization.

Except for a bona fide raffle winner, an individual or group may not:
benefit financially from the holding of a raffle; or
receive or be paid any proceeds from a raffle for personal use or benefit.
